summary: A delicious collision of Jellybeans and Xoria256.
name: JellyX
description:
A carefully balanced hybrid of Jellybeans ( vimscript #2555 ) and Xoria256 ( vimscript #2140 ).

Designed for 256-color terminals and GUI vim.

Running rxvt-unicode? Version 9.10 introduces an official 256-color mode.
Recompile with `configure --enable-256-color` and enjoy.


### Github

http://github.com/guns/jellyx.vim


### Options

Show tabs in dark grey, trailing whitespace in dark pink

    let g:jellyx_show_whitespace = 1
    colorscheme jellyx


### Screenshots

Term: rxvt-unicode 9.10 with --enable-256-color configure option
Font: Consolas

 * Ruby, with incremental search
   http://guns.github.com/jellyx.vim/images/ruby.png

 * Sass and CSS, with visual selection
   http://guns.github.com/jellyx.vim/images/sass-css.png

 * C, with g:jellyx_show_whitespace=1
   http://guns.github.com/jellyx.vim/images/c-with-whitespace.png

 * VimScript, with folds and completion popup
   http://guns.github.com/jellyx.vim/images/folds.png
